AINFO_TYPE (UNION)

Â¶
TYPE AINFO_TYPE : UNION
This union either contain Profibus or Profinet alarm information, depending on the used IO subsytem type (see:
RALARM
).
InOut:
Name
Type
Comment
DP
DP_AINFO
Profibus alarm information
PN
PN_AINFO
Profinet alarm information
